pullRequest.title: [homekit] add support for QR code based pairing
pullRequest.bodyText:
replace #9458 that was wrongly pushed with too many files changed. sorry for that.
small goodie for OH3 - support for QR code based pairing to HomeKit.
this PR includes:
update of java-hap library to the next version. this version add support for qr code, linked services and new jmDNS version
add QR code to configuration
make use of ConfigurationAdmin in order to update Homekit configuration
update README: pairing process using QR code and adding metadata using new UI

commit.message:
add support qrcode based pairing

Signed-off-by: Eugen Freiter <freiter@gmx.de>

update config only if differnt to prevent endless update loop

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -22,7 +22,11 @@
 			<label>Thermostat Current Heating/Cooling Mapping</label>
 			<description>String values used by your thermostat to set different targetHeatingCooling modes</description>
 		</parameter-group>
-
+		<parameter name="qrCode" type="text" required="false" groupName="core">
+			<label>HomeKit QR Code</label>
+			<context>qrcode</context>
+			<description>Scan QR code with home app to add OpenHAB as HomeKit bridge. </description>

nodes.bodyText: Words in labels should be capitalized (except prepositions and so on). See https://www.openhab.org/docs/developer/bindings/thing-xml.html#formatting-labels-and-descriptions
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -33,6 +37,10 @@
 			<description>Defines the pin, used for pairing, in the form ###-##-###.</description>
 			<default>031-45-154</default>
 		</parameter>
+		<parameter name="setupId" type="text" pattern="[0-9A-Z]{4}" required="false" groupName="core">
+			<label>setupId</label>
